oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Pen-level prevalence and Environmental Risk Factors for Escherichia coli 0157:H7 Fecal Shedding by Feedlot Cattle
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Smith, D. R.
Younts, S. M.
Blackford, M. P.
Gray, J. T.
Moxley, R. A.
Hungerford, L. L.
Milton, C. T.
Klopfenstein, T. J.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: fecal shedding
pen prevalence
feedlot pen
Escherichia coli
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The objective of this study was to describe feedlot pens by the point-prevalence of cattle shedding Escherichia coli O157:H7 in feces, and to look for relationships between pen prevalence and other characteristics of the pen.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: American Association of Bovine Practitioners Conference Proceedings; 2000; 160
